ResourceHeader.AlternateName: Ion composition mode; Omnidirectional; Channel D : Group 2 (Si, Mg, C)
ResourceHeader.Description: Ion composition mode channel D. The available spectra are obtained by summing over all directions. * Species : Si, C, Mg * Nb of energy Bins : 192 * Energy range : 87 keV - 18.5 MeV * Nb of looking directions : 80
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the National Aeronautics and Space Administration, NASA
